name: Inconveniece Store
description: Welcome to the future of grocery shopping as you know it! As early adopters of the Metaverse, we strive to create a realistic grocery shopping experience available to all, right from the comfort of their homes. With us, you can find all of the groceries available to you in physical grocery stores, such as {FRUIT} and {CONDIMENT}. In our revolutionary immersive experience, you will be able to interact with the virtual world in extremely accurate ways: picking up objects off of shelves, placing them in your cart, and...jumping.  We hope you enjoy shopping with us, and experience zero problems whatsoever, have a meta day!
